message.body: Hey buddy. You got a couch/floor I could crash on in BK Sunday night?
sorry man, im still crashing a couch myself
Ah ok. That's cool
I'm in NYC til Monday, doing anything tonight?
Bar 169. canal and east broadway
Word, you there now?
Cool, I'll meet you there
I'm here
I'm going to go to a 5:15 Stake land showing at the IFC. Lemmie know if you want to go, if not that's cool
Hey man dont think i can make it. fun hanging out last night, gotta do it again soon. i owe yoy oysters next time
Haha alright
You grilling for memorial day? ill be in town
Yeah I'm grilling tomm night if you want to come by
Cool dude thats awesome. ill call you tomorrow
Ok
The amount of Russians here in ocean city is really interesting
Been that way for years, its pretty bizzarre.they get theyre earlyier than the college kids to get the waiter jobs
Yeah that's what I figured. I want to find out where they eat. I bet there are secret Russian restaurants around somewhere
Nope. its all just kids from outta town. they party, eat ramen and work
What was the restaurant you suggested in target the other day? I forgot what it was called
Harrisons harborwatch
Cool, their menu looks really good. What about a place thats good for a large group who want to do all you can eat crabs?
Sorry, that was a ocmd resturant suggestion for noah
Haha you sent that to me, Noah
Crab bag or higgins crab house. up in the 100s
sorry i got all messed up in my inbox
That's cool, where do you suggest for all you can eat crabs?
old mill crab house. not sure where it is
Cool. They are right near us on the northside. Thanks man
I'm on the bus drunk now and feel very old at the age of 24 with all of these Maryland teenagers haha.
Yo whats yr email? My friend nick and I are making a short and were wondering if you might wanna design it. It would be two or three weekends in the fall
in south Norwalk ct

Hey man, I got a last minute Funny or Die shoot early in NYC tomm and can't stay out late tonight. If you are around at all this weekend we should get some food/drink. Get drunk tonight happy birth!!!
It's all good man, yeah let's chill this weekend
Sounds good
